channel.title: Framerate Stutter
channel.description:
First of all, awesome mod so far, the time and effort that's gone into this is amazing. :slight_smile:
But I'm having trouble, whenever an NPC starts talking or music starts, I get quite a bad framerate. My laptop isn't exactly top of the line, but it runs EP2 on full with no issues. Is anyone else having the same problem or worked out a fix?

item.title: Framerate Stutter
